name: Crafty Shield
description: You summon forth a mysterious power that blocks an incoming status condition. When you or an ally within 5 feet of you are subject to a status condition from a move, you may use your reaction to nullify the condition.

effect.name: Excites the audience a lot if used first.
effect.effect: Raises the crowd meter by 2 if successfully performed first in correct contest, raises the crowd meter by 1 if successfully performed first in complementary contest.
